# Who this book is for

Users of traditional Desktop GIS software or Spatial Databases that want to quickly script their analytical work in an expressive language in a familiar user interface.

## Background

These materials were originally part of a workshop at the FOSS4GNA-2018 conference in St Louis. They've been updated for clarity.
